summary: Fix temp file permissions from 0o700 (rwx------) to 0o600 (rw-------)

changes.description: Changed os.fchmod() from stat.S_IRWXU (0o700) to stat.S_IRUSR | stat.S_IWUSR (0o600). Updated comment to match implementation.
Added regression tests that verify temp file has exactly 0o600 permissions with no execute bit set.

risks: None identified. The fix is minimal and corrects a documentation/implementation mismatch.
acceptance_criteria_met: No execute bit set on temp file
